ValidationRule.description: If Project Completion field is set to 100%, the Actual Project Finish date Phase 1 field (and the Actual Project Finish date Phase 2 where applicable) must be filled out.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), project_completion__c = 1, OR ( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( PLANNED_Project_Finish_date__c)), ISBLANK(Actual_Project_Finish_date__c)), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PLANNED_Project_Finish_date_Phase_2__c)), ISBLANK( Actual_Project_Finish_Phase_2__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the actual project finish date(s).
